data.text: @ValFaulkner16 And of course Arthur was my Dads name! Xx
@ValFaulkner16 Oh congratulations. Beautiful babies. Lots of work but so much joy 😘😘 btw Vera is on my Dads side. X

@CoombsSamantha Introduce her to my new grandsons, Archie and Arthur, born, at 31 weeks, on 16th February. Both are doing brilliantly. Om not sure what the relationship is, but Hannah is adding to the family tree! Xxx https://t.co/qbQtMFsNNg
@CoombsSamantha 😆😆😆 he’s had a little holiday in the spare room with full room service i was quite jealous. Hope she’s on the mend soon x
@ValFaulkner16 Thanks Val. She loves it when I tell her the response from social media 😂💕

@LauraNourish Thank you. She has a heavy cold and a cough. Hopefully she will be ok. Now confusion easing she’s reacting with her usual acceptance and is sure it’ll “just pass”. Tell Andy that’s just greedy to have it twice. It’s just for attention 😂😂
@CoombsSamantha I hope she’s ok. It’s worrying isn’t it. Andy has just had it again and barely had a runny nose so fingers crossed she has minimal symptoms xxx
@Pam_Roberts_ I’ll pass on your good wishes Pam xx
@CoombsSamantha Get well soon Vera! Sending lots of love xx
